title: Smead Sees Fed, Markets 'Dichotomy'
itunes:title: Smead Sees Fed, Markets 'Dichotomy'
description:
Cole Smead, President at Smead Capital Management, discusses the markets, FOMC rate decision and investing. Jon Erlichman, Anchor of BNN Bloomberg's The Open, breaks down Facebook earnings.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
